content:
Welcome to ZenFabric! This blog is dedicated to practical tutorials and insights on:
Microsoft Fabric — The unified analytics platform Power BI — Business intelligence and visualization Data Engineering — ETL, pipelines, and architecture What to Expect I’ll be sharing real-world examples, code snippets, and lessons learned from production environments.
Sample Code Block Here’s how code will look on this blog:
import pandas as pd df = pd.read_csv("data.csv") print(df.head()) Stay tuned for more content!
summary:
Welcome to ZenFabric! This blog is dedicated to practical tutorials and insights on:

  • Microsoft Fabric — The unified analytics platform
  • Power BI — Business intelligence and visualization
  • Data Engineering — ETL, pipelines, and architecture

What to Expect

I’ll be sharing real-world examples, code snippets, and lessons learned from production environments.
